subject: Skiing
Athletics and Sports
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Haunted by the memory of a violent accident in a race early last year, the 2006 Olympic men’s downhill champion, Antoine Dénériaz of France, announced his retirement Wednesday.
snippet: Haunted by the memory of a violent accident in a race early last year, the 2006 Olympic men’s downhill champion, Antoine Dénériaz of France, announced his retirement Wednesday.
